Articles.Content:
hello

Sometimes when I stay too long in the vab I can't add any new parts. I can select them but I cant stick them to my craft. to correct that I need to go out of the VAB and because it's a bug sometimes either do I crash or my ship simply disapear. It is not a big bug but when I say a long time I mean over like 8 ou 10 min and I think we all know we can stay a lot more in the VAB.

keep going the game is cool
Yep, I stopped to eat while in the VAB and then couldn't add parts.  It was strange.  I don't remember if I had to exit the game to fix it or just the VAB.
